notices.title: System Maintenance
notices.message: The system will be down for maintenance on Saturday, 25th November, from 10 PM to 4 AM.

notices.title: Holiday Announcement
notices.message: The office will remain closed on Monday, 27th November, for a public holiday.

notices.title: Weekly Meeting
notices.message: Don't forget to attend the weekly meeting this Friday at 3 PM in the conference room.

notices.title: Promotion
notices.message: We are excited to announce the promotion of Matthew John to the role of Project Manager.
